sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import Textarea from './Textarea';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"textarea"}}>{`Textarea`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`문자열을 입력받는 컴포넌트입니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Textarea} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Textarea placeholder="입력해주세요." />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea placeholder="입력해주세요." />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"inline-textareas"}}>{`Inline textareas`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<Textarea inline placeholder="입력해주세요." />
<Textarea inline placeholder="입력해주세요." />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea
    inline
    placeholder="입력해주세요."
  />
  <Textarea
    inline
    placeholder="입력해주세요."
  />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-allow-message"}}>{`With allow message`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<Textarea allowMessage="올바른 값입니다." />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea allowMessage="올바른 값입니다." />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-error-message"}}>{`With error message`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __code={`<Textarea errorMessage="특수문자를 제외하고 입력해주세요." />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea errorMessage="특수문자를 제외하고 입력해주세요." />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-warn-message"}}>{`With warn message`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={5} __code={`<Textarea warnMessage="보안에 취약한 값입니다." />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea warnMessage="보안에 취약한 값입니다." />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"disabled-textarea"}}>{`Disabled textarea`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={6} __code={`<Textarea placeholder="잠금 상태입니다." disabled />`} __scope={{props,Textarea}}>
  <Textarea placeholder="잠금 상태입니다." disabled />
</Playground></MDXTag>
